sources.title: Adopting Terror | Full Thriller Movie | Sean Astin
sources.description:
*Adopting Terror* - A husband and wife learn that the biological father of their adopted baby daughter will stop at nothing to get her back.
2012.  Stars: Sean Astin, Samaire Armstrong, Monet Mazur

metadata.Plot: Tim and Cheryl Broadbent are excited to finally adopt Mona, a beautiful baby girl. But when the baby's biological father starts stalking them, their world turns upside down: through intimidation, manipulation, and violence, he is determined to take his daughter back.
metadata.Actors: Sean Astin, Samaire Armstrong, Monet Mazur
